which are available to a Community Action
Agency, the following identification and de¬
scriptions have been provided by the Educational
Broadcasting Branch of the FCC.
ETV - EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION
Under section 73.621 of the Rules, ETV stations
are licensed only to "nonprofit educational
organizations... to serve the educational needs
of the community, for the advancement of edu¬
cational programs, and to furnish a nonprofit,
noncommercial TV broadcast service...ETV broad¬
casting stations may transmit educational,
cultural, and entertainment programs, and pro¬
grams designed for use by schools and school
systems in connection with regular school courses,
as well as routine and administrative material
pertaining thereto.
ITV - INSTRUCTIONAL TELEVISION
Under FCC Form 340 (CP Application for Educational
Stations) an Instructional Program "includes all
programs designed to be utilized by any level of
educational institution in the regular instructional
programs of the institution - In-School, In-Service
